meta_description: We are delighted to announce that the Joslyn Art Museum will reopen on Tuesday, September 10, 2024. 5,000 years of human creativity in art across three buildings. 100 works new to the collection on view. Three outstanding exhibitions. One stunning new building. Free general admission to all, always. Your Museum, reimagined.
hours_text:
Welcome! Here is where to look for details about hours and admission and to connect with other information to guide and enhance your visit.

Free general admission to The Joslyn is generously provided by the Holland Foundation.

[Visit](/visit/ "Visit")

# Welcome

#### Museum Hours

Tue–Sun: 10 am–4 pm  
Late until 8 pm on Thu  
Closed Mon and major holidays

**  
Special Museum Closure Notices  
****Thu, Apr 23, 2026:** Museum will close early at 4 pm (hours: 10 am–4 pm).

#### Cafe & Shop Hours

**The Shop**  
Open during all regular Museum hours.

**  
The Durham Cafe presented by Clean Slate**

_**Tue–Sun (closed Mon)**_  
10 am–3 pm (order from menu)  
3–4 pm (beverages, grab & go items only)

**_Thu night_**  
4–7 pm (order from menu)  
7–8 pm (beverages, grab & go items only)

_The Cafe seating areas are open to Cafe patrons during all regular Museum hours._

**  
Special Cafe Closure Notices  
Thu, Apr 23, 2026:** The Cafe will close at 4 pm.

#### Admission

**Free general Museum admission at The Joslyn is generously provided by the Holland Foundation.**

Everyone is admitted at no cost to The Joslyn during all regular Museum hours. All permanent collection galleries and most temporary exhibitions are included in free general Museum admission.

Selected temporary exhibitions have a ticket fee for those ages 13 and older. Ticketed exhibitions are always free to those 12 and younger. For every ticketed exhibition, The Joslyn schedules days when tickets are free to all...

collections_text:
The Joslyn—5,000 years of human creativity in art across three buildings.

Free general admission to all, always—generously provided by the Holland Foundation.

Hours: Tue–Sun, 10 am to 4 pm; late until 8 pm on Thu. Closed Mon.

# What's New?

## Plan Your Visit

The Joslyn is open again following a two-year period of construction and renovation. Our Visit details page is the place to look for hours, admission, and guidelines information.

[Learn More](https://joslyn.org/visit/visit-detail/)

## The Phillip G. Schrager Collection

The inaugural presentation of the collection at The Joslyn celebrates Schrager’s vision and passion for collecting and offers a sweeping perspective on five decades of art.

**Pictured:** Matthew Ritchie (British, b. 1964), _The First Sea,_ 2003, oil and marker on canvas, 99 × 110 in. (251.5 × 279.4 cm), The Phillip G. Schrager Collection. Promised gift of Terri L. Schrager, © Matthew Ritchie, Photograph © Bill Ganzel, Ganzel Group Communications, Inc.

[Learn More](https://joslyn.org/the-phillip-g-schrager-collection/)

B

## Become a Member Today!

Membership is more than admission and benefits. Members help to create meaningful experiences with art for everyone. In turn, members become part of an essential community of supporters, with additional opportunities to access the Museum and build deeper connections with our collection.

[Join Now](https://joslyn.org/support/)

The Joslyn—5,000 years of human creativity in art across three buildings.
